sourcesContent:
Clasificador colaborativo
  • News
  • Images
  • CACA
import { SelectClassificatorComponent } from './../select-classificator/select-classificator.component'; import { Component, OnInit, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.less'] }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit { constructor() { } public variableType: string = 'NEWS'; @ViewChild('selectClassificator') public selectClassificator: SelectClassificatorComponent; ngOnInit() { } public selectOption(option: string) { this.variableType = undefined; setTimeout(() => { this.variableType = option; // this.selectClassificator.ngOnInit(); }, 0); } }
